title: Anguilla, Georgia
text:
Anguilla is an <a href="unincorporated%20community">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Glynn%20County%2C%20Georgia">Glynn County</a>, in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>.
History.
The community was named after <a href="Anguilla">Anguilla</a>, in recognition of that island's cotton industry.
